scripts.pull: npm run warn-pull && npm run update-env && rimraf ./content && uniform sync pull
scripts.push: node update-env.js && uniform sync push && npm run warn-after
scripts.warn-pull:
echo 'WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! 

THIS WILL DELETE ALL FILES IN /content/ DIR' > /dev/null
scripts.warn-after:
echo 'WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! 

Data Sources and Integrations are not supported for sync via CLI, use Uniform Toolbox Chrome extension for this' > /dev/null
